title: Caught in Karnaphuli river, 23kg katla sold for Tk 23,000
body: A katla fish, a local carp variety, weighing a staggering 23 kilogrammes, was caught from the Karnaphuli river in Kaptai upazila of Rangamati on December 8. Local fisherman Ujjal Mallik said he caught the fish in his net in the evening and later sold it to locals for Tk 23,000, at Tk 1,000 per kg. Sheikh Md Ershad bin Shahid, upazila senior fisheries officer (additional duty) in Kaptai, confirmed the incident. "The Karnaphuli is connected to Halda river from Kaptai side, so many fish of carp varieties are found here," he said.
